title: A sustainable method for oxidizing phenanthrene in tropical soil using natural iron as a catalyst in a slurry phase reactor with persulfate assistance
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00328D, Paper
Mohammad Qutob, Rafatullah Mohd, Syahidah Akmal Muhammad, Masoom Raza Siddiqui, Mahboob Alam
The presence of impurities is a significant restriction to the use of natural iron minerals as catalysts in the advanced oxidation process (AOP), especially if applied for soil remediation. This...
